short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension allows quick access to StackOverflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to a programmers greatest knowledge store, StackOverflow. You can quickly search StackOverflow from the popup extension, as well as check your inbox to keep up with you're notifications.
